heading: Shipping and payment
body:
Moscow: 3-4 days
Saint-Petersburg: 2-3 days
Russia: 3-10 days
Internation shipping: 10-30 days

You can discuss the ways of increasing the speed of shipping with a shop manager.

Manager of Omkara.Market is available Mon-Sun, 10:00 - 19:00 (+3 GMT)

Shipping timing provided without order handling time.

Our warehouse is located in Saint Petersburg.
